title: Kuda Oya Amuna sand mining permit suspended with immediate effect
content: The Minister of Environment, Mahinda Amaraweera yesterday instructed the Geological Survey and Mines Bureau (GSMB) to immediately suspend the sand mining permit issued by the Geological Survey and Mines Bureau for the removal of sand from the Kuda Oya Amuna in the Vijayabahupura Division of the Mahaweli B Zone of the Sri Lanka Mahaweli Authority.The Environment Ministry advised the GSMB to suspend the sand mining permit for the Kuda Oya Amuna project with immediate effect.
